column14: Exozodi Detection Limit at IWA (in zodi)
column16: Exozodi Level measured by LBTI at 11 microns

column19: For stars 1 to 20 the best sensitivity to exozodi, which is reached at the IWA, is reached closer in than the HZ inner edge. (the HZ inner edge is > 150 mas)

column21: (if IWA = 0.3" then there are only 12 stars where Hzin < IWA < Hzout, and the sensitivty is degrared by a factor of 4 wrt IWA =0.15")
if IWA is 6l/D at 900nm = 0.47", there is  none.

column19: For stars 21 to 81, CGI's best exozodi sensitivity is reached in the HZ.
For stars 82 to 150, best sensitivity (reached at IWA) is reached  outside of  the HZ outer edge.
